data.title: Is Dwight Howard Gay? Heres What The NBA Star Has To Say About The Rumors!
data.meta_description: Dwight Howard, the American basketball star, is in the news because some of his T1 league fans are wondering if he is gay. Even after Dwight cleared the air, the rumor that he was gay persisted for years. Learn all there is to know about Dwight Howard here!
data.text:
Dwight Howard, the American basketball star, is in the news because some of his T1 league fans are wondering if he is gay.

Even after Dwight cleared the air, the rumor that he was gay persisted for years. Learn all there is to know about Dwight Howard here!

Is Dwight Howard Gay?

No, Dwight Howard Is Not Gay, According to Sporting News. The NBA player debunked all the allegations once and for all when he made an appearance on âFair Gameâ on FS1 in 2019.

âIâm not gay. Itâs a lot of people who are and they have to hide and itâs people who have mental issues and they have to hide. Itâs people who have different problems in life and they have to hide.

They have to put on the mask every day. Itâs like, I donât want to wear no mask. I just want to be,â said Dwight.

Dwight Howard claims that while the allegations that he is gay âhurtâ him, handling the aftermath has âliberatedâ him.

"I'm not gayâ¦ It hurt at first to go through it. I sat at home and I was like 'I never want to come outside again.'" @DwightHoward spoke on the allegations that he was gay.

(ð¥: @FairGameonFS1 | @KristineLeahy) pic.twitter.com/WcXz2WtOfY

â Complex Sports (@ComplexSports) July 16, 2019

Dwight responded to the fake claims and also affirmed that he is not gay while firmly opposing homophobia.

Dwight claims he faced a lot of discrimination from others who believed he was gay, and he claims he now comprehends why people are reluctant to come out and be who they truly are in public.

After the charges became public, Howard claims he spent months reflecting on his life and considering how he wanted to be remembered, particularly in the eyes of his children.

Also Read: Is Jacksepticeye Gay? Or Is It Just Another Rumor?

Is Dwight Howard Single?

The dating history of Dwight Howard is really intriguing. Some reports also suggest that the well-known basketball player has five children with five different women, which is impossible to prove despite the fact that he has dated numerous women during his life.

The eight-time NBA All-Star has dated a number of women, but as of 2023, according to Dating Celebs, he hasnât been spotted with a girlfriend and is single. Dwight appears to be quite sociable on social media, but he hasnât given any information about his love life. We can therefore presume that he is single as of right now.

Where Is Dwight Howard In 2023?

One of the greatest NBA players ever, Dwight Howard, has played a supporting role the past few seasons despite being an eight-time All-Star (as opposed to a star).

He announced on Instagram on November 8, 2022, that he would be playing for the Taoyuan Leopards this season.

Dwight Howardâs debut game with the Taoyuan Leopards, which he joined in early November, was an overtime victory and drew a sizable international audience. Since then, the Leopards havenât had much good fortune on the court.

Howard has participated in 6 games thus far this season, scoring 23.8 points, grabbing 12.8 rebounds, and dishing out 4.8 assists per contest. He is first (#9 in the league) in assists, second (#2 in the league) in rebounds, and third on the team in scoring (#5 in the league).

During his stint with the Los Angeles Lakers last season, Howard averaged 6.2 points and 5.9 rebounds in a little over 16 minutes of action per game.

Also Read: Greg Gutfeld Is Rumored To Be Gay After Promising To Build a Gay Bar!

Where Are Taoyuan Leopards Now?

The Taoyuan Leopardsâ most recent match was against the Kaohsiung Aquas.

The matchup on Sunday night between the sixth-ranked Leopards (3-11) and the second-ranked Aquas (11-7) was the most crucial game of the previous round. The Leopards defeated the Aquas 116â137.

They dominated the gameâs low post, scoring 76 of their points there compared to Aquasâ 56 and converting 25 of their 29 attempts (86.2 percent) at the line.

The next roundâs matchup on the road between the Leopards and the higher-ranked TB Herobears (#4) promises to be a difficult one.

Dwight Howardâs Net Worth

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Dwight Howard has a $140 million net worth. Dwight Howard made $247 million in salary alone throughout the course of his NBA career.

In addition, he received about $100 million in revenue from endorsements.
